text.div:
Hepatitis A (Tests for hepatitis A virus IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13950-1 Hepatitis A virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    22314-9 Hepatitis A virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    22315-6 Hepatitis A virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    51660-9 Hepatitis A virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Body fluid
    5181-3 Hepatitis A virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum by Immunoassay
    5182-1 Hepatitis A virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum by Radioimmunoassay (RIA)
